emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of the Original Junior Mothers' Club, left to right; Mary Douglass, Louise Anderson, Marguerite Peters, Harriet Lewis, Lulu Proctor Lewis, Ethel Posey, Margaret Hall, and Sue McNeal, gathered in front of the Ruskin apartments for the fortieth anniversary bridge luncheon
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 8, 1954, pg. 11 reads: "Original Mothers' Club - The Original Junior Mothers' club celebrated its fortieth anniversary by giving an elegant bridge-luncheon at the Ruskin last Saturday. Pictured here are the members.  Left to right: Mrs. Mary Douglass, Mrs. Louise Anderson, Mrs. Marguerite Peters, Mrs. Harriet Lewis, president; Mrs. Lulu Proctor Lewis, Mrs. Ethel Posey, Mrs. Margaret Hall and Mrs. Sue McNeal. - Harris Photo."
